regions.name: England
regions.notes: Standard HMRC income tax bands apply

regions.name: Scotland
regions.notes: Scottish Parliament sets own income tax rates and bands since 2017/18

regions.name: Wales
regions.notes: Welsh rates of income tax apply since 2019/20; currently match England/NI rates

regions.name: Northern Ireland
regions.notes: Standard HMRC income tax bands apply; corporation tax devolution under discussion
